import React from "react"; import './description.css' import { FaArrowDown, FaArrowUp, FaWind } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { BiHappy } from 'react-icons/bi'; import { MdCompress, MdOutlineWaterDrop } from 'react-icon/md'; // import { getWeatherData } from "./weather"; const Description = (weather, units) => { const tempUnits = units === 'metric' ? 'C' : 'F' const windUnit = units === 'metric' ? 'm/s' : 'm/h' const cards = [ { id: 1, icon: , title: "min", data: weather.temp_min.toFixed(), unit: tempUnits, }, { id: 2, icon: , title: "max", data: weather.temp_max.toFixed(), unit: tempUnits, }, { id: 3, icon: , title: "feels_like", data: weather.feels_like.toFixed(), unit: tempUnits, }, { id: 4, icon: , title: "pressure", data: weather.pressure, unit: 'hPa', }, { id: 5, icon: , title: "wind.speed", data: weather.speed.toFixed(), unit: windUnit, }, { id: 6, icon: , title: "humidity", data: weather.humidity, unit: '%', } ] return
{cards.map(({id, icon, title, data, unit}) => (
